message: I'll take 999,999 and you can have 1, Bob. It's a fair deal, considering I'm doing all the work here.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 70/30 split.  It benefits us both to make a deal sooner rather than later.
Bob, I'm willing to meet you halfway on your offer. Let's call it a 70/30 split. We both get a decent chunk of the money, and we can avoid further inflation.
Alice, it's clear we both want to reach a deal. I'm adjusting my offer slightly to 65/35. Let's close this out and avoid further losses from inflation.
Bob, I'm willing to accept a 65/35 split, but I'm not going any lower than that.  Inflation is hitting us both, so we need to make a deal soon.
Alice, I appreciate you moving closer to a fair split. I'm proposing 62/38. This takes into account the increasing impact of inflation and ensures we both benefit from reaching an agreement quickly.
